text: I’m guessing there’s nothing native to HubSpot, I’m thinking I’m going to use the related posts tag, and ajax and a fair bit of JS to get around HubSpots poor blog customisation
Great question... I’m not immediately sure what your options are, but I’ll look into it!
Hm… doesn’t sound familiar. Can you share a screenshot? And a link, if you’re alright with me taking a look at your portal :slightly_smiling_face:
